stanza.line: Full many a glorious morning have I seenseen
Flatter the mountain tops with sovereign eyeeye
Kissing with golden face the meadows greengreen
Gilding pale streams with heavenly alchemyalchemy
Anon permit the basest clouds to rideride
With ugly rack on his celestial faceface
And from the forlorn world his visage hidehide
Stealing unseen to west with this disgracedisgrace
Even so my sun one early morn did shineshine
With all triumphant splendour on my browbrow
But out alack he was but one hour minemine
The region cloud hath masked him from me nownow
Yet him for this my love no whit disdainethdisdaineth
Suns of the world may stain when heaven sun stainethstaineth
